body_html:
Actually I think it is actually better to let the is_training argument as part of the network, see
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim/nets which have unified API and would be merge soon into tf.contrib

body:
Actually I think it is actually better to let the is_training argument as part of the network, see 
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim/nets which have unified API and would be merge soon into tf.contrib
